Package com.locuslabs.sdk.ibeacon

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IBeaconConsumer
    An interface for an Android Activity or Service that wants to interact with iBeacons.
    IBeaconData  
    IBeaconDataNotifier  
    MonitorNotifier
    This interface is implemented by classes that receive iBeacon monitoring notifications
    RangeNotifier
    This interface is implemented by classes that receive iBeacon ranging notifications
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BeaconReading  
    BeaconService
    Periodically send beacon data to the LocusLabs SDK Every once in a while (say, every 3 minutes) we collect beacon data for a certain length of time (say 15 seconds) before going back to sleep for another 3 minutes.
    IBeacon
    The IBeacon class represents a single hardware iBeacon detected by an Android device.
    IBeaconIntentProcessor  
    IBeaconManager
    An class used to set up interaction with iBeacons from an Activity or Service.
    Region
    This class represents a criteria of fields used to match iBeacons.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BleNotAvailableException
    Indicates that low energy bluetooth is not available on this device
